tree_data:
Extract text, tables, images, attachments. Detect tables, search text.
Extract text and table data in TXT, CSV, XLS, XML and JSON formats
Extracts text and table data to plain text format (TXT)
Extracts tables to CSV format
Extracts text and tables data to XLS format
Extracts text and tables data to XML format
Extracts text and tables data to JSON format
Detects tables in PDF document
Find text in PDF document
Extracts embedded images and save to various image formats
Extracts attached files from PDF document \
Extracts XFA Form components from PDF document
Extracts form data to XFDF (XML Forms Data Format)
Extracts embedded video and audio files
Conversion of PDF document to images and HTML pages
Converts PDF document to bitmap
Converts PDF document to multipage TIFF with selectable compression types
Converts PDF document to vector images
Convert PDF document to HTML file
Tools to read document information and manipulate (split, merge) PDF files
Gets PDF document page count, author, subject, title, etc...
Splits PDF document in parts or extract pages
Merges two PDF documents into single one
Rotate PDF document
Make scanned PDF document searchable
Make PDF document unsearchable
Put an image (e.g. sign or stamp) on document pages.
Remove text object from document page.
Optimize PDF document file size.
OCR analysis for better recognition.
